These vehicles necessitate careful attention from the ego car's driver to safely change lanes, requiring awareness of their speeds and trajectories to maintain safe lane discipline.

The presence of orange barriers along the median is also noted. These barriers serve to separate opposite lanes of traffic, clearly defining traffic lanes and prohibiting any crossing or turning across the median. This setup guides the ego car to stay within the current lanes, adhering to lane discipline and ensuring safe navigation through the area.
